title: Prompt for credentials every time
author: bbbbrains
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
I am in an environment which doesn't allow use of stored credentials and I've manually deleted them wherever I could find them (eg . in the mRemoteNG Connection config)  
However, every time I double click a connection, it first tries to authenticate with credentials stored somewhere.  I want it to immediately prompt for credentials

notes:
AI triage (claude): Feature request to add an option that forces credential prompt on every connection attempt instead of using cached/stored credentials, useful for security-conscious users.
Approach: Add a boolean property AlwaysPromptForCredentials to ConnectionInfo, then in the credential resolution path check this flag and bypass cached credentials, showing the credential dialog before each connection.
